Every Man Jack, Mattifying Face Lotion

Brand: Every Man Jack

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: (WATER), ALOE BARBADENSIS (ALOE VERA) LEAF JUICE, GLYCERIN, CETYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERYL STEARATE, DICAPRYLYL CARBONATE, STEARIC ACID, PHENOXYETHANOL, MODIFIED CORN STARCH, CARBOMER, PANTHENOL (VITAMIN B5), ALLANTOIN, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, PISTACIA LENTISCUS (MASTIC) GUM, LECITHIN
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
